UPDATE AC_APPLICATION
appcode = #{appcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
appid = #{appid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
appname = #{appname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
apptype = #{apptype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isopen = #{isopen,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
opendate = #{opendate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
appdesc = #{appdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
maintenance = #{maintenance,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
manarole = #{manarole,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
demo = #{demo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
iniwp = #{iniwp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
intaskcenter = #{intaskcenter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ipaddr = #{ipaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ipport = #{ipport,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE AC_APPLICATION
appcode = #{domain.appcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
appid = #{domain.appid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
appname = #{domain.appname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
apptype = #{domain.apptype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

opendate = #{domain.opendate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
url = #{domain.url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
appdesc = #{domain.appdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
maintenance = #{domain.maintenance,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

iniwp = #{domain.iniwp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
intaskcenter = #{domain.intaskcenter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

${wc.condition}
